content: {"version":2,"machineId":"4f3f94df-7f64-454b-8f25-b6c28964a2aa","content":"{\"linux\":\"// Place your key bindings in this file to override the defaultsauto[]\\n[\\n    {\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+k ctrl+u\\\",\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"editor.foldAllBlockComments\\\",\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorTextFocus && foldingEnabled\\\"\\n    },\\n    {\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+k ctrl+shift+7\\\",\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"-editor.foldAllBlockComments\\\",\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorTextFocus && foldingEnabled\\\"\\n    },\\n    {\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+k ctrl+u\\\",\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"editor.action.blockComment\\\",\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorTextFocus && !editorReadonly\\\"\\n    },\\n    {\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+shift+a\\\",\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"-editor.action.blockComment\\\",\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorTextFocus && !editorReadonly\\\"\\n    }\\n]\"}"}
